name: David Aydin
bio: I am a Software Engineer with a degree in Computer Science. I have created SQL and NoSQL (MongoDB) Databases and sucessfully developed an interactive video game. I joined a team of other engineers and desginers to build a robot for a competition hosted by Panasonic, and most reacently I served as an associate for Amazon, providing leadership and training for fellow associates. The digital realm of computers has always been a passion of mine and I enjoy building meaningful applicaitons with socially conscious teams.
